fields.name: Watch Intro Video
fields.description:
Every quest starts with a single step, and yours should start by watching the Kukui Cup introduction video that you seem to have skipped when you logged in for the first time. The video will help you to understand what the Kukui Cup is all about, and briefly introduce you to the things you can do to win.

To watch the video:

1. click on the Get Nutz icon ![scoreboard icon](/site_media/static/css/default/images/icon-scoreboard.png)
2. click on the first square in the Smart Grid Game (upper left corner)
3. watch the video
4. answer a question about it correctly
5. you are on your way to Kukui Cup domination!

fields.name: Learn about energy
fields.unlock_conditions: has_task(name='Intro video') and (not (has_task(name='Power & Energy') and has_task(name='Energy Intuition')))
fields.description:
The Kukui Cup is all about energy: learning about it and conserving it. On this quest, you will learn some basic information about power and energy, which will give you a solid foundation for all the other energy-related activities in the game.

You must watch two videos (**Power & Energy**, and **Energy Intuition**) and answer a question about each in order to complete this quest. You can find the videos in the Smart Grid Game, which is located on the Get Nutz page.

To get to the Get Nutz page, click on the icon that looks like a old-school scoreboard in the navigation bar in the upper left corner of this page. The two videos are in the Basic Energy column of the Smart Grid Game.

After you click on the square for a video, you will see the video embedded in the web page. Click on the video to play it. Pay attention while the video plays, as you have to answer a question about the video to get your points. Once you have watched the video, click the "I Did This" button. Enter your answer to the question, and press Submit. If you don't know the answer, close the dialog box and try watching the video again.

A Kukui Cup Admin will review your answer (usually in a few hours) and if you answered correctly, you will be awarded 10 points for each video.

fields.name: Get social
fields.unlock_conditions: has_task(name='Intro video') and (not (has_task(name='Like Cup') or has_task(name='Share link')))
fields.description:
To be successful, the Kukui Cup needs a lot of people to participate and we need your help. This quest is about getting the word out about the Kukui Cup to all your friends on Facebook. If you don't have a Facebook account, then this quest is not for you (or maybe this is a reason to start using Facebook!)

To complete this quest, you will have to complete two activities: Like Kukui Cup on Facebook, and Share Kukui Cup link on Facebook. You can find both of these in the Smart Grid Game on the Get Nutz page.

To get to the Get Nutz page, click on the icon that looks like a old-school scoreboard in the navigation bar in the upper left corner of this page. The two Facebook activities are in the Get Started column of the Smart Grid Game.

Click on the grid square for the activities (you may have to hunt around to find them). Each one will explain what you have to do to complete the activity. To demonstrate that you have completed the activity, you will need to take a screenshot of the Facebook page, and then upload that for verification.

A Kukui Cup Admin will review your screenshots (usually in a few hours), and you will be awarded 5 points for each one.

fields.name: Make a commitment
fields.description:
One of the things you can do in the Kukui Cup is make a commitment. Commitments range from little things, like wearing a Kukui Cup button to promote the competition, to big things, like not eating meat. Each commitment lasts for 5 days, during which you agree to live up to the commitment. Once the 5 days are over, you come back to the site to collect your points.

Making a commitment earns you 2 points, and when you come back 5 days later to certify that you lived up to your commitment, you get another 5 points. To keep you focused, you can only commit to 5 things at a time.

To complete this quest, you must make a commitment. Commitments are found in the Smart Grid Game on the Get Nutz page.

To get to the Get Nutz page, click on the icon that looks like a old-school scoreboard in the navigation bar in the upper left corner of this page. Commitments are the brown squares in the Smart Grid Game.

Click on the grid square for any commitment (you may have to hunt around to find one you like). Each one will explain what commitment you are being asked to make. Once you make the commitment, you will get 2 points instantly. Don't forget to come back 5 days later to get the rest of your points.

fields.name: Sign up for an event
fields.description:
Part of the Kukui Cup is a series of events scheduled throughout the competition. These events highlight local organizations working on the issues of energy and sustainability, what they are doing, and how you can get involved. You can sign up for an event to indicate your interest in attending, and see who else is going.

Signing up for an event gets you 2 points. At the event, you will receive a little slip of paper that contains an attendance code. This code is like a ticket stub, it proves that you attended the event. Once the event is over, you can enter the attendance code to get the rest of your points (usually 20 points).

To complete this quest, you must sign up for an event. Events are found on the Get Nutz page. Once on the Get Nutz page, you will see a list of events occurring in the near future on the left-hand side of the page. You can also find events in the Smart Grid Game on the right hand side of the page.

Click on an event you would like to attend. Each one will explain what the event is about, and when & where it will take place. Click the "I want to sign up" button to RSVP, and you will get 2 points instantly. Don't forget to attend the event, and come back with your attendance code to get the rest of your points.

fields.name: Sign up for an excursion
fields.description:
There are a lot of interesting things going on in energy and sustainability around Oahu. Excursions are trips off campus to see and learn about cool stuff. Since we have only a limited amount of space for transportation, you must sign up for an excursion if you want to go.

Signing up for an excursion gets you 2 points. At the end of the excursion, you will receive a little slip of paper that contains an attendance code. This code is like a ticket stub, it proves that you attended the event. Once the event is over, you can enter the attendance code to get the rest of your points (usually 30 points).

To complete this quest, you must sign up for an excursion. Excursions are found on the Get Nutz page. You can find excursions in the Smart Grid Game on the right hand side of the page. Excursions are the red colored grid squares.

Click on an excursion you would like to attend. Each one will explain what the excursion is about, and when & where you will board the bus. Click the "I want to sign up" button to RSVP, and you will get 2 points instantly. Don't forget to show up for the excursion, and come back with your attendance code to get the rest of your points.

fields.name: Win the $10 bonus!
fields.description:
You're already getting some money for participating in our study, in appreciation for your time. To keep things interesting, you can win an **additional $10** if you can earn enough points to have the highest score of all the current players!

To complete this quest, earn as many points as you can and totally dominate the Kukui Cup.

Hint: check the scoreboard to see how you are doing.

fields.name: Win a Bubbies Gift Certificate!
fields.description:
To "sweeten" the pot, during this session you can win a gift certificate to Bubbies Ice Cream, conveniently located near campus.

To complete this quest, you must figure out how to win that certificate.

The certificate is one of the prizes available in the Raffle Game on the Prizes page. Click on the Prizes icon in the navigation bar to get to the Prizes page. The Raffle Game is on the left hand side of the Prizes page.

For every 25 points you earn, you get a raffle ticket. You can allocate your ticket(s) to any of the prizes in the raffle, and each ticket gives you one chance to win the prize at the end of the round. However, all the other players are also allocating their raffle tickets to the prizes, which lowers your odds. You can change your allocation of tickets at any time until the Raffle Game deadline shown below the list of prizes. At the end of the round, the Raffle Game randomly picks one ticket for each prize, and the owner of that ticket wins the prize!

Find the Bubbies gift certificate in the list of prizes, and allocate one ticket to it using the "+1" button. Good luck, and hopefully nobody else will allocate any tickets to it!

fields.name: Get the Fully Committed badge
fields.description:
While earning points and conserving energy is great, wouldn't it be awesome if there was a way to get a little recognition for all your hard work? Lucky for you, there is: **BADGES**. Badges represent achievements reached during the game, both big and small.

For the most part, you'll have to discover the badges on your own, but we're going to give you a hint on this one. You will receive the Fully Committed badge when you make 5 commitments (the maximum allowed by law). To complete this quest, you just need to get the badge by topping off your commitments to 5.

You know the drill by now: go to the Get Nutz page, click on some brown squares that represent commitments in the Smart Grid Game, and get your badge.

fields.name: Get a grip on energy use
fields.description:
While making commitments and completing activities is important, the other side of the Kukui Cup is reducing your dorm's energy usage. The Go Low page can show you how much power & energy your dorm is using in real time.

To complete this quest, perform the "Examine your lounge's energy use" activity on the Get Nutz page. You'll find it in a green square under the Basic Energy category.
